step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands. Try to keep your wrists a bit straighter in the next repetitions.
You're raising your hands well. Focus on keeping your elbows closer together as you bring your hands towards your forehead.
Excellent work spreading your elbows wide behind your head. This is a key part of the stretch.
Holding the stretch is great. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid leaning forward.
Returning to the start position smoothly is important. Pay attention to your wrist alignment as you reverse the movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter and elbows closer as you move your hands up. Continue to spread your elbows wide behind your head for a good stretch.
